statements: SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_feedback WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score >= 4;
SELECT patient_id, survey_date, satisfaction_score FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score < 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score, MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score FROM patient_feedback;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM patient_feedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%good%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%';
SELECT * FROM patient_satisfaction_surveys;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_satisfaction_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 8;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM patient_feedback GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score, feedback FROM patient_satisfaction_surveys ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_satisfaction_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score >= 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_date, feedback_text FROM patient_feedback WHERE patient_id = 12345 AND feedback_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;

SELECT survey_id, patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_satisfaction_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patient_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score, COUNT(survey_id) AS total_surveys FROM patient_satisfaction_surveys;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM patient_feedback GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_feedback > 5 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT survey_id,feedback FROM patient_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3
SELECT provider_id,provider_name,specialization FROM care_providers
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT survey_id,question_id,response_value FROM survey_responses ORDER BY survey_id,question_id DESC
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT survey_id, patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_surveys WHERE patient_id = 'a1b2c3'
SELECT provider_name, department FROM care_providers WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT survey_id, response_value FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 1
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys JOIN survey_responses ON patient_surveys.survey_id = survey_responses.survey_id
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_surveys ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_demographics WHERE age > 50;
SELECT provider_id, name, specialty FROM care_providers WHERE location = 'Hospital';
SELECT department_id, satisfaction_score, quality_rating FROM department_ratings ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC, quality_rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys;
SELECT patient_id, satisfaction_score FROM patient_surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT * FROM patient_surveys WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT department_id, satisfaction_score, quality_rating FROM department_ratings ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT name, specialty, location FROM care_providers WHERE location IN ('Hospital A', 'Hospital B');
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys;
SELECT survey_id, satisfaction_score, feedback_text FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT p.patient_name, c.target_completion_date FROM Patients p JOIN Care_Improvement_Plans c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id ORDER BY c.target_completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT p.patient_name, cip.improvement_description FROM Patients p JOIN Care_Improvement_Plans cip ON p.patient_id = cip.patient_id WHERE cip.target_completion_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT s.survey_id, s.satisfaction_score, r.response_date FROM Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys s JOIN Survey_Responses r ON s.survey_id = r.survey_id ORDER BY r.response_date DESC;

SELECT f.type_name, ps.feedback_text FROM Feedback_Type f JOIN Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys ps ON f.type_id = ps.survey_id WHERE f.type_name LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY ps.satisfaction_score DESC LIMIT 5;
